name: Double Layer Pumpkin Cheesecake
description: A great alternative to pumpkin pie, especially for those cheesecake fans out there. Serve topped with whipped cream.
reviews: This cheesecake tasted just like the pumpkin cheesecake we used to serve at a 5 star restaurant.
Have to admit I'm flummoxed by all the rave reviews. I love pumpkin and I love cheesecake but this didn't do it for me. It was ok. That's about it.
terrible.. u couldnt taste the pumpkin.
